Articles.Content:
Hello! Welcome to the Bio Space Program News Central, Where I update on my KSP missions, such as new rockets/planes, moon landings (either on the Mun or Minmus) , and more! Cya in my next Update!

P.S I will use the KSP Flight Records format, And also show my rocket in pictures

UPDATE!

Here\'s the craft, each one has its own spoiler file thingy

CRAFT:Pheonix-I

MISSION: obtain an orbit with expiremental craft

CREW: Bill, Jebediah, and Bob kerman

LAUNCH DATE: 7/3/12

NOTES:

This was done in the demo

T+0:15 Slight tilt noticed

T+ 1:00 Tilt correction

T+ 02:25 Orbital hight reached, engine cut out, perparing for orbital burn

T+ 2:48 Orbital postion reached, burn starts

T+ 6:00 Preapsis gained, burn complete.

T+ 1:16:03 Circulization burn complete

T+ 1:45:?? Deorbit complete

T+ 1:55:30 landed in moutian, rolling off

T+ 1:56:?? SAS reactivated, saves crew.

FLIGHT DURATION: 1:58:10

MISSION OUTCOME: Success!

CRAFT: Humana-III

MISSION: Enter A polar orbit and take polar cap photos

CREW: Geofcott, Munvis, and Shersey Kerman

LAUNCH DATE: 6/28/2012

NOTES:

T+ 4:20 Orbital manuever began

T+7:28 Periapsis of 79,931/2 gained

T+2:08:50 Northern Cap Image aqiured

T+ 2:52:40 Southern Cap Images Aquired

T+ 3:18:51 Deorbital burn complete, perparing to land

T+ 3:36:34 Landing! Mission complete

FLIGHT DURATION:3 hours, 37 min, 4 seconds

MISSION OUTCOME: Sucess!

MORE Breaking news: I crash landed on the mun! Everyone died, and nothing was left, but there\'s a screenshot below

Breaking news! The Kerbal Space Outpost has successfully acheived an orbit with a preapsis of 77 km.

See screenshots below!

NOTE Screenshots are being worked on, for now, you\'ll simply see them below, you\'ll also see some .craft files

Now have posted screenies on Imugur.

NOTE PLZ vote in the poll! I need to know what to do next! (poll closes tommorow)

I\'d suggest removing the line:

P.P.S Please only comment if you have a suggestion

After all, maybe people wanna not give advice, but say like: hey nice rocket dude!
Hehehe...Pretty nice. How about some screenshots? Press f1 while ingame to save a picture to the KSP Screenshots folder in your install. Then just attach it to the forum post!
Yeah, I know how to take screen shots, it\'s the party where I put them on here that IDK
I think you should start a base on Minmus! Or on the Mun.

Let me say this AGAIN

I\'ll do that after I\'ve landed there, and after I\'ve made a space station

OK, announcement! So, now that the time limit is reached, and the poll is ended, here are the results!

I will be doing EVA\'s when they come out!!

Random news!

I plan on sending up some satellites to-[information top secret, revoked] to make it easier to-[Revoked] with an upcoming-[Revoked].
I have pictures of the satellite! I had to steal them from a file cabinet I\'m not allowed to touch get the pictures from a certain source, but here they are.
Oh yeah! Forgot to post EVA pictures! Here they are:
